definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: But also I think those Ice Age conditions were critical as well.
sentences.chinese: 但我認爲當時冰河時代的客觀條件也是極爲關鍵的。

sentences.english: Take events during the final few centuries of the last ice age.
sentences.chinese: 舉上次冰河時代最後幾個世紀發生的事件爲例。
